ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder

Class Ingredient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder.Ingredient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Ingredient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Ingredient is the basic unit for storing a type of ingredient to file. One ingredient contains three attributes, type, amount and unit. Allow the user to get those attributes in String. Only the amount attribute is allowed to be modified once it's created.
    Version:
    1.00 07/03/13
    Author:
    cmput-301 team 2
    See Also:
    MyKitchen, Recipe, Serialized Form
